title: LF Top/Jungler/Support
body:
Hey guys,

As the title explains I'm looking for a top laner, jungler and a support to fill the rest of my team. Currently there's Wylies24 (Gold 2 ADC) and me. If you're interested, please fill out the below form and add me in game if you wish to talk to me, otherwise I'll add you when I see the application. =)!

Name:
Age:
Role:
Champion pool (for role you're applying for):
Solo queue rank (can OP.GG link if you wish):
Curse Voice (Y/N):
Availability:
Will you play in tournaments?:
Do you spend a lot of your time playing league?:

Thanks,
Josh. :)

replies.body:
Name: James
Age: 23
Role: Jungle/jg/tarzan
Champion pool (for role you're applying for): Any, personal fav's are noccy-t and vi, but seriously any. par maybe shaco, not at a level that i'd ranked with him yet.
Solo queue rank (can OP.GG link if you wish): S3 
Curse Voice (Y/N): Y
Availability: most of the time, i work casual shift work but know ahead of time if i can't make a certain scheduled day
Will you play in tournaments?: Yes
Do you spend a lot of your time playing league?: Yes

Name: Bailey
Age: 19
Role: top
Champion pool (for role you're applying for): Gnar Ryze and Nasus are top 3 but can play majority of top laners to success 
Solo queue rank (can OP.GG link if you wish): silver 5 havent played much ranked this season 
Curse Voice (Y/N):
Availability: everyday besides sundays at certain times, and tuesday and thursday nights
Will you play in tournaments?: yes. have alot of tournament experience aswell
Do you spend a lot of your time playing league?: yes i play quite alot
Curse voice makes my framerate die so i cant use it either

Name: Tristan
LoL Name: Panicwave
Age: 15
Role: Support/ Jungler
Champion Pool: (Jungle) Lee Sin, Pantheon, Shyvana, Vi and Wukong (might learn sejuani)
(Support) Annie, Blitz, Braum, Janna, Leona, Lulu, Morgana, Thresh
SQ Rank: Silver 3
Curse Voice: No but I can get it, I also have skype
Availability: 7pm-10pm weekdays, most of the time on weekends. I'm kinda busy with work, sport, debating. 
Tournaments: I guess so?
Yes I play League whenever I can basically.
It would be cool to join a serious team, but I'm kind of busy, so I guess I'm applying for a substitute position. :)

Name: DRAbsol
Age: 14
Role:Support
Champion pool (for role you're applying for): Thresh,Karma
Solo queue rank (can OP.GG link if you wish): Bronze 5 but can play support to silver pottential unable to escape due to mmr being low because this used to be a shared account.
Curse Voice (Y/N): N but I have skype
Availability: 3:30 pm - 9:00 pm weekdays All day weekends
Will you play in tournaments?: Yes
Do you spend a lot of your time playing league?: Yes

Previously **Platinum I **in Season 5, and also have a plat V smurf, I also used to coach League on LoLCoaching, so shotcalling is something I am alright at, but I'm more of a lane analysis guy.
When I play ranked I generally play mid or sup (Plat level), and I play a pretty decent jungle (about Gold II level)

**My support champions include**
Thresh                   Janna
Annie                     Zyra
Leona
Blitzcrank
Morgana

My Jungler pool is fairly wide, just ask me if your interested ^ ^
I don't rage at all, in fact I have never gotten a chat restriction or anything like that. My timezone is ACST (Adelaide time), i'm not sure what timezone your team is, but I'm sure we could work things out :3 .
I also have Skype, Mumble and could download Teamspeak if necessary.
If you're interested, add me on my main: **Blizzard9789**

Name: Adjacent World
Age: 19
Role: Top/Jungle/Sup
Champion Pool: Top - Sion, Malphite, Maokai, Nasus and Gnar, Jungle - Warwick, Rek'Sai, Sejauni, Nautalis and Vi, Support - Thresh, Leona, Morgana, Braum and Bard
Solo Queue rank: G5
Curse Voice: N I prefer Teamspeak but I can get Curse if necessary.
Availability: Weekends with the occasional week day due to Uni and Work.
Tournaments: Hell Yes.
Do I spend a lot of time on League: Yes.

Name: Baden
Age: 20
Role: Top
Champion pool (for role you're applying for): Maokai, Morgana, Liss, can play most meta top laners (prefer tanks)
Solo queue rank (can OP.GG link if you wish): G4
Curse Voice (Y/N): Y
Availability: flexible depending on work/sports
Will you play in tournaments?: Yea can do
Do you spend a lot of your time playing league?: yes
